summary: A behind the scenes chronicle of how clash of vision, bad creative decisions, lack of interest and really bad weather plagued the disastrous production of the infamous La isla del Dr. Moreau (1996).
cast: Richard Stanley|Kier-La Janisse|Michael Gingold|Graham Humphreys|Edward R. Pressman|Robert Shaye|Tim Sullivan|Tim Zinnemann|Fairuza Balk|Bruce Spaulding Fuller|Marco Hofschneider|Rob Morrow|Graham 'Grace' Walker|Fiona Mahl|Neil Young|David Grasso|Peter Elliott|David Hudson|Lewis Dickson|Oli Dickson|James Sbardellati|Jack Wareham|Paul Katte|Emile Nicolaou|Stephen Earnhart
keywords: film about a film|behind the scenes|clash of vision|infamous|remake
title: Lost Soul: El viaje maldito de Richard Stanley a la isla del Dr. Moreau
